channel.description: Week 15 Announcements This Week & Next Week 7 & 8 Lessons Milestone 6 Week 7 & 8 Single Sign-On CAS Authentication ASP.NET MVC React Milestone 6 Fulfilling Requests User Roles User Management Create New Boxes Aesthetics & Usability 200 Points Aesthetics & Usability Consistent Look & Feel Minimize "Clicks" Smart Routing Helpful Labels & Errors Iconography Navigation & Context Hover Animations TEVALs Available Finals Week Anonymous, Delayed All feedback welcome!
